Description: Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) code identifying the state and county (or county equivalent) of the observation
Year of the observation, ranging from 1994 to 2018
Certificate number identifying a financial institution
Name of the state and county in which the observation is located
Name of the state in which the observation is located
FIPS code identifying the state in which the observation is located
Population of the given county-year
Name of the financial institution
The Consumer Price Index for urban consumers, scaled so that the CPI in 2018 is equal to 100
Deposits reported by the financial institution in the given county-year
Number of physical locations of the financial institution in the given county-year
=1 indicates that a financial institution meets the FDIC definition of a community bank in the given year, =0 indicates that a financial institution does not meet this definition
Total amount of all bank assets (loans, securities, etc.)
Dollar amount of all loans currently outstanding from financial institution
Dollar amount of financial institution equity capital
Dollar amount of all loans from financial institution secured by real estate
Dollar amount of all loans from financial institution to finance agricultural production or other loans to farmers
Dollar amount of all loans from financial institution for commercial and industrial purposes
Dollar amount of all loans from financial institution to individuals for household, family, or other personal expenditures
Dollar amount of all loans from financial institution made via credit cards
Dollar amount of all loans currently outstanding from financial institution with no payments made in the last 90 days
Dollar amount of all loans from financial institution secured by real estate with no payments made in the last 90 days
Dollar amount of all loans from financial institution to finance agricultural production or other loans to farmers with no payments made in the last 90 days
Dollar amount of all loans from financial institution for commercial and industrial purposes with no payments made in the last 90 days
Dollar amount of all loans from financial institution to individuals for household, family, or other personal expenditures with no payments made in the last 90 days
Dollar amount of all loans from financial institution made via credit cards with no payments made in the last 90 days
Dollar amount of all loans originated at under $1 million from financial institution secured by nonfarm, nonresidential properties
Dollar amount of all loans originated at under $1 million from financial institution for commercial and industrial purposes
Dollar amount of all loans originated at under $500,000 from financial institution to finance agricultural production
Number of all loans originated at under $1 million from financial institution secured by nonfarm, nonresidential properties
Number of all loans originated at under $1 million from financial institution for commercial and industrial purposes
Number of all loans originated at under $500,000 from financial institution to finance agricultural production
Dollar amount of all income received from labor, land, and capital, including income transfers, divided by the county population
Number of individuals employed in county, including all self-employed individuals and excluding unpaid workers
Dollar amount of all income received by individuals and partnerships that operate farms, excluding income received by corporate farms
Number of individuals who are owners of farms
Dollar amount of income received by nonfarm business owners
Number of individuals who are owners of nonfarm establishments
Dollar amount of income received by all business owners
Number of individuals who are owners of farm or nonfarm establishments
